lead_paragraph: Michael Chang, who captured the French Open title at the age of 17, ending a 34-year drought by American men at Roland Garros, was inducted into the International Tennis Hall of Fame in Newport, R.I.
snippet: Michael Chang, who captured the French Open title at the age of 17, ending a 34-year drought by American men at Roland Garros, was inducted into the International Tennis Hall of Fame in Newport, R.I.
